timeline.bodyText: I think if there's an issue in FlatteningDeserializer, then we should fix that issue instead of making an internal method public to work around this issue. Once this method is made public, it cannot be removed without causing a breaking change.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Without this method, current users cannot make any changes to the proxy configuration or logging, or retry, or anything. The only public method to create a BatchClient allows passing in only the credential.
replies.author: jianghaolu

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the clarification @jianghaolu . Ideally, we should have named this method create() but since there is already a public method called open() that creates a BatchClient using credentials, we should continue to use the same name.
replies.author: srnagar
